09:19 <DennisA> Good Morning, i just installed XWiki Enterprise 6.3-rc-1 without any Problems. Everything works fine except the german letters "ä", "ö" and "ü" . On pages they are written correctly, but if i search with the search-application i get results like: "Ã?Â?stra" instead of  "Üstra". I tried different settings (Database, Solr and Lucene) for the search engine without success. Could someone help me to get the right spelling?
